title: Lowest Net ODA Received
description: In 2022, Malaysia received only 0.0067% of its central government expenses as net official development assistance, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Lowest Battle-related Deaths
description: In 2017, Malaysia recorded only 1 battle-related death, indicating a very low level of conflict-related fatalities.

title: Highest Net Forest Depletion
description: In 2021, Malaysia had a net forest depletion valued at approximately $6.36 billion, one of the highest in the world.
